All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Alliance
Describes the sides of the checkers game.
AuthController
Provides endpoints for authenticating into a game.
AuthService
Provides a contract for a service which can manage authentication for ongoing games.
AuthServiceImpl
Provides an implementation of AuthService.
AuthServiceImpl.AuthRecord
 
BackendApplication
Holds the entrypoint of teh application.
Board
This class holds information about a game of checkers.
BoardMovesDto
A simple DTO containing a list of moves from a given position.
BoardMovesDto.RawMoveDto
A simple DTO containing a move.
BoardService
Provides a contract for a service which can keep track of all ongoing games.
BoardServiceImpl
Provides an implementation of BoardService.
BoardTransition
Holds information about a move, the board before and after.
BoardUpdateDto
A simple DTO containing board update information.
BoardUpdateDto.RawPieceDto
A simple DTO describing a Piece on the board.
CheckersController
Provides websocket endpoints for gameplay.
GameController
Provides endpoints for creating and finding games.
Move
Describes a move.
MoveDto
A simple DTO containing auth information and move information.
MoveGenerationService
Provides a contract for a service which can generate moves from a given board.
MoveGenerationServiceImpl
Provides an implementation of MoveGenerationService.
MoveKind
Describes the different move types.
Piece
Describes a piece.
PieceKind
Describes a piece's type.
UuidDto
A simple DTO containing a UUID.
WebSocketConfig
Holds the websocket configuration)
